result.arabic_text: إِنَّآ أَرۡسَلۡنَا نُوحًا إِلَىٰ قَوۡمِهِۦٓ أَنۡ أَنذِرۡ قَوۡمَكَ مِن قَبۡلِ أَن يَأۡتِيَهُمۡ عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٞ
result.translation: (1) Indeed, We sent Noah to his people, [saying], "Warn your people before there comes to them a painful punishment."

result.arabic_text: قَالَ يَٰقَوۡمِ إِنِّي لَكُمۡ نَذِيرٞ مُّبِينٌ
result.translation: (2) He said, "O my people, indeed I am to you a clear warner -

result.arabic_text: أَنِ ٱعۡبُدُواْ ٱللَّهَ وَٱتَّقُوهُ وَأَطِيعُونِ
result.translation: (3) To worship Allāh, fear Him and obey me.

result.arabic_text: يَغۡفِرۡ لَكُم مِّن ذُنُوبِكُمۡ وَيُؤَخِّرۡكُمۡ إِلَىٰٓ أَجَلٖ مُّسَمًّىۚ إِنَّ أَجَلَ ٱللَّهِ إِذَا جَآءَ لَا يُؤَخَّرُۚ لَوۡ كُنتُمۡ تَعۡلَمُونَ
result.translation: (4) He [i.e., Allāh] will forgive you of your sins and delay you for a specified term. Indeed, the time [set by] Allāh, when it comes, will not be delayed, if you only knew."

result.arabic_text: قَالَ رَبِّ إِنِّي دَعَوۡتُ قَوۡمِي لَيۡلٗا وَنَهَارٗا
result.translation: (5) He said, "My Lord, indeed I invited my people [to truth] night and day.

result.arabic_text: فَلَمۡ يَزِدۡهُمۡ دُعَآءِيٓ إِلَّا فِرَارٗا
result.translation: (6) But my invitation increased them not except in flight [i.e., aversion].

result.arabic_text: وَإِنِّي كُلَّمَا دَعَوۡتُهُمۡ لِتَغۡفِرَ لَهُمۡ جَعَلُوٓاْ أَصَٰبِعَهُمۡ فِيٓ ءَاذَانِهِمۡ وَٱسۡتَغۡشَوۡاْ ثِيَابَهُمۡ وَأَصَرُّواْ وَٱسۡتَكۡبَرُواْ ٱسۡتِكۡبَارٗا
result.translation: (7) And indeed, every time I invited them that You may forgive them, they put their fingers in their ears, covered themselves with their garments,[1761] persisted, and were arrogant with [great] arrogance.

result.arabic_text: ثُمَّ إِنِّي دَعَوۡتُهُمۡ جِهَارٗا
result.translation: (8) Then I invited them publicly.

result.arabic_text: ثُمَّ إِنِّيٓ أَعۡلَنتُ لَهُمۡ وَأَسۡرَرۡتُ لَهُمۡ إِسۡرَارٗا
result.translation: (9) Then I announced to them and [also] confided to them secretly

result.arabic_text: فَقُلۡتُ ٱسۡتَغۡفِرُواْ رَبَّكُمۡ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ غَفَّارٗا
result.translation: (10) And said, 'Ask forgiveness of your Lord. Indeed, He is ever a Perpetual Forgiver.

result.arabic_text: يُرۡسِلِ ٱلسَّمَآءَ عَلَيۡكُم مِّدۡرَارٗا
result.translation: (11) He will send [rain from] the sky upon you in [continuing] showers

result.arabic_text: وَيُمۡدِدۡكُم بِأَمۡوَٰلٖ وَبَنِينَ وَيَجۡعَل لَّكُمۡ جَنَّٰتٖ وَيَجۡعَل لَّكُمۡ أَنۡهَٰرٗا
result.translation: (12) And give you increase in wealth and children and provide for you gardens and provide for you rivers.

result.arabic_text: مَّا لَكُمۡ لَا تَرۡجُونَ لِلَّهِ وَقَارٗا
result.translation: (13) What is [the matter] with you that you do not attribute to Allāh [due] grandeur

result.arabic_text: وَقَدۡ خَلَقَكُمۡ أَطۡوَارًا
result.translation: (14) While He has created you in stages?[1762]
result.footnotes: [1762]- i.e., in various progressive states and conditions.  See also 22:5 and 23:12-14 in reference to development of the embryo.

result.arabic_text: أَلَمۡ تَرَوۡاْ كَيۡفَ خَلَقَ ٱللَّهُ سَبۡعَ سَمَٰوَٰتٖ طِبَاقٗا
result.translation: (15) Do you not consider how Allāh has created seven heavens in layers[1763]

result.arabic_text: وَجَعَلَ ٱلۡقَمَرَ فِيهِنَّ نُورٗا وَجَعَلَ ٱلشَّمۡسَ سِرَاجٗا
result.translation: (16) And made the moon therein a [reflected] light and made the sun a burning lamp?

result.arabic_text: وَٱللَّهُ أَنۢبَتَكُم مِّنَ ٱلۡأَرۡضِ نَبَاتٗا
result.translation: (17) And Allāh has caused you to grow from the earth a [progressive] growth.

result.arabic_text: ثُمَّ يُعِيدُكُمۡ فِيهَا وَيُخۡرِجُكُمۡ إِخۡرَاجٗا
result.translation: (18) Then He will return you into it and extract you [another] extraction.

result.arabic_text: وَٱللَّهُ جَعَلَ لَكُمُ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ بِسَاطٗا
result.translation: (19) And Allāh has made for you the earth an expanse

result.arabic_text: لِّتَسۡلُكُواْ مِنۡهَا سُبُلٗا فِجَاجٗا
result.translation: (20) That you may follow therein roads of passage.'"

result.arabic_text: قَالَ نُوحٞ رَّبِّ إِنَّهُمۡ عَصَوۡنِي وَٱتَّبَعُواْ مَن لَّمۡ يَزِدۡهُ مَالُهُۥ وَوَلَدُهُۥٓ إِلَّا خَسَارٗا
result.translation: (21) Noah said, "My Lord, indeed they have disobeyed me and followed him whose wealth and children will not increase him except in loss.

result.arabic_text: وَمَكَرُواْ مَكۡرٗا كُبَّارٗا
result.translation: (22) And they conspired an immense conspiracy

result.arabic_text: وَقَالُواْ لَا تَذَرُنَّ ءَالِهَتَكُمۡ وَلَا تَذَرُنَّ وَدّٗا وَلَا سُوَاعٗا وَلَا يَغُوثَ وَيَعُوقَ وَنَسۡرٗا
result.translation: (23) And said, 'Never leave your gods and never leave Wadd or Suwāʿ or Yaghūth and Yaʿūq and Nasr.'[1764]
result.footnotes: [1764]- These were the names of specific idols named after pious men of earlier generations.

result.arabic_text: وَقَدۡ أَضَلُّواْ كَثِيرٗاۖ وَلَا تَزِدِ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ إِلَّا ضَلَٰلٗا
result.translation: (24) And already they have misled many. And, [my Lord], do not increase the wrongdoers except in error."

result.arabic_text: مِّمَّا خَطِيٓـَٰٔتِهِمۡ أُغۡرِقُواْ فَأُدۡخِلُواْ نَارٗا فَلَمۡ يَجِدُواْ لَهُم مِّن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ أَنصَارٗا
result.translation: (25) Because of their sins they were drowned and put into the Fire, and they found not for themselves besides Allāh [any] helpers.

result.arabic_text: وَقَالَ نُوحٞ رَّبِّ لَا تَذَرۡ عَلَى ٱلۡأَرۡضِ مِنَ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ دَيَّارًا
result.translation: (26) And Noah said, "My Lord, do not leave upon the earth from among the disbelievers an inhabitant.

result.arabic_text: إِنَّكَ إِن تَذَرۡهُمۡ يُضِلُّواْ عِبَادَكَ وَلَا يَلِدُوٓاْ إِلَّا فَاجِرٗا كَفَّارٗا
result.translation: (27) Indeed, if You leave them, they will mislead Your servants and not beget except [every] wicked one and [confirmed] disbeliever.

result.arabic_text: رَّبِّ ٱغۡفِرۡ لِي وَلِوَٰلِدَيَّ وَلِمَن دَخَلَ بَيۡتِيَ مُؤۡمِنٗا وَلِلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ وَٱلۡمُؤۡمِنَٰتِۖ وَلَا تَزِدِ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ إِلَّا تَبَارَۢا
result.translation: (28) My Lord, forgive me and my parents and whoever enters my house a believer and the believing men and believing women. And do not increase the wrongdoers except in destruction."
